PART TWO

THE INTELLIGENCE CRISIS

What you've seen so far [in the Snowden theft of documents]

is just the tip of the iceberg.

—RETIRED ADMIRAL MICHAEL MCCONNELL,

vice-chairman, Booz Allen Hamilton, 2013
